amendment.description: Amendment directs the Secretary of the Army to release the interests of the United States in certain tracts of land located in Cameron County, Texas, and for other purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vela amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Vela.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Vela amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
